entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
